name: count
description: Counts the number of events in the repository or streaming through the function. The result is put in a field named '_count'. You can specify a field to count only events containing that field, and can output a distinct count.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Field to count. If specified, only events containing this field are counted

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: Name for the output count field (default: _count)

parameters.name: distinct
parameters.description: If true, counts only distinct values (default: false)

output_fields.name: _count
output_fields.description: Count of events (or custom field name if 'as' parameter is used)
